md:
## MLB Teams Checklist Template


The MLB Teams Checklist Template is designed for baseball fans who want to keep track of the Major League Baseball teams they have seen. Whether you’re attending games in person or watching from home, this checklist allows you to mark off each team as you experience them.


### Key Features


### Easy to Use


This template is structured for simplicity, making it easy for users to quickly check off teams. With clearly defined divisions and teams, you can easily see your progress at a glance.


### Organized Layout


The checklist is divided into the American League and National League, further categorized by divisions. This organization helps you track which teams you’ve seen in a structured manner, making it perfect for any baseball enthusiast.


### Customizable


The template is fully customizable, allowing you to add notes about each game, such as the date, location, or any memorable moments. Feel free to modify sections or add additional teams if you choose to include minor league or international teams in your checklist.


### Summary Section


At the end of the checklist, there’s a summary section where you can calculate the total number of teams you’ve seen and note the last team you experienced. This provides a quick reference to your baseball journey and enhances your overall enjoyment of the sport.
title: Checklist For MLB teams I have seen
